title: There Are Infinite Mikan Days!
detail_text: <:th_ch0101/>These mikans look good, these mikans look good 𝅘𝅥𝅮<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0107/>Chika-chan, you’re in a good mood~ Were they on sale?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0101/>These mikans were free! Today is Mikan Day!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0107/>Huh? Is today Mikan Day?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0101/>Is it not today?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0107/>Eh?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0101/>December 3rd is the official day, but it’s also the third day of every month~<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0107/>Isn’t that too many Mikan Days......?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0101/>Doesn’t that just mean...... there’s a high demand for mikans!? I guess it’s because mikans are just that delicious~! Here, Hanamaru-chan, have some 𝅘𝅥𝅮<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0107/>Thank you~!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
